lead_paragraph: ROSENTHAL--Dorothy, (nee Kuttas), passed away peacefully at her residence on June 4, 2016 in her 97th year. Mother of Blaine Rosenberg and the late Deedee Rosenthal. Graveside services will be held at Beth Jacobs Cemetery, Hamilton, Ontario at 3pm on Wednesday, June 8, 2016. Shiva at Shalom Village, 70 Macklin St. North, Hamilton, Wednesday and Thursday 5pm-8pm. Service at 7pm and Friday 11am-12 Noon. Donations, in lieu of flowers, to Shalom Village, Hamilton, ON, in memory of Dorothy Rosenthal. 1/3
